contents.content: Started my contribution towards the gaming industry by participating in the Bangladesh Gaming Expo 2016 & 2017 where I aimed to break the stereotypes in our industry.
I started working with XR(AR,VR,MR) from 2015 when people knew little about XR. At that time, I developed the first commercial enterprise solutions using XR technology.
